programme.title: Barra on the Bann
programme.desc: Weather presenter Barra Best travels along the Bann, meeting people who live, work and relax on Northern Ireland's longest river.

programme.title: Dave
programme.desc: Mike decides he should become Dave's manager, and Dave is convinced he has picked up an infectious illness from rapper Young Thug at a party. Elz gets to work with Trippie Redd.

programme.title: Saved and Remade
programme.desc: The workshop is full of history and memories, as a stunning Polish cloak that once belonged to a musician and a collection of family rings are among the items the remakers transform. Presented by Sabrina Grant.

programme.title: Putin vs the West
programme.desc: Putin intensifies his aggression toward the West, from the Salisbury poisonings to clashes with Donald Trump over nuclear missiles, and fiery rhetoric aimed at NATO, concluding with the moment he launches his invasion of Ukraine. The Head of the CIA, Bill Burns, recounts his secret mission to Moscow to deliver a stark warning to Putin that US Intelligence was on to his plan to invade, while NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg tells of the last-ditch diplomatic efforts to avert war.

programme.title: Scarlett's Driving School
programme.desc: Fifty-six-year-old Linda is desperate to get a driving licence so she can help look after her grandchildren, but as an 'older learner' who is hard of hearing she has failed her test six times. Teaching Linda is her 53-year-old sister Debbie, but after three years in the car together, both of them are at the end of their tethers. Can five days at Scarlett's Driving School help create some calm in the car, and more importantly give Linda the parking and navigation skills she needs to pass at her seventh attempt?.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers explore the food provided by British waterways as they fly-fish for trout, prepare a meal of stuffed wild duck and discover how the Gloucestershire tradition of eating baby eels has virtually disappeared.

programme.title: Gorilla Family and Me
programme.desc: Part one of two. Wildlife cameraman Gordon Buchanan travels to the Democratic Republic of the Congo, where he realises a lifelong dream by spending time with Grauer's gorillas, the largest primates on earth. He meets the fearsome alpha male Chimanuka and two babies, one a lonely orphan and as Gordon gains the trust of these mysterious, seldom seen animals, he discovers their incredible compassion and gets caught up in a battle between giant rival silverbacks for control of the family.

programme.title: Priceless Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce presents another selection of clips from the series, this time highlighting some of the most dedicated collectors to have appeared on the show. Plus, the latest additions to the Roadshow's team of specialists discuss how they have adjusted to their new roles.

programme.title: Flog It!

programme.title: Richard Osman's House of Games
programme.desc: Mina Anwar, Glen Moore, Kiri Pritchard-McLean and Shaun Williamson test their general knowledge skills on their penultimate day of head-scratchers.

programme.title: Coastal Defenders
programme.desc: The diving team get a late call from a boat in peril. A missing lifeboat cannister means a ferry is unable to sail, causing chaos for the passengers that use the service for their daily commute. It's a needle-in-a-haystack hunt in near-zero visibility - and to make matters worse, local leisure cruisers create imminent danger for the diver underwater.

programme.title: Back in Time for Birmingham
programme.desc: The Sharmas' journey through British Asian history continues into the 1980s and 1990s, a time when the hard work and sacrifices of South Asian families were beginning to pay off. The family convenience moves away from serving a predominantly South Asian clientele to a mini-mart serving a wider range of customers, and 1982 sees the shop stocking their first VHS tapes for hire. Later, the Sharmas host their last end of era party and reflect on what this journey has taught them about the South Asian experience.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The two highest scoring chefs from London and the South East go head to head and cook their six-course menus again. They serve their dishes to the panel of judges - Tom Kerridge, Nisha Katona, Ed Gamble and today's guest, celebrated illustrator Dapo Adeola. Andi Oliver hosts.

programme.title: Murder in the Pacific
programme.desc: The documentary continues with the investigation into the sinking of the Rainbow Warrior in May 1985. Just one day after the explosions that sunk the Greenpeace ship, police were overwhelmed with calls from people claiming to have spotted unusual goings on. One witness led to Swiss tourists Alain and Sophie Turenge. They came into the station voluntarily but their inability to answer simple questions led police to doubt their identities.

programme.desc: David Dickinson and his team help members of the public in Colne, Lancashire, determine which of their most treasured possessions are worth the most. programme.desc: Les's return proves a shock for Seth and Ashley, who have let profits drop in his absence. Back in charge, the manager cuts a deal that could increase profits.

programme.title: Hardcore Pawn
programme.desc: Ashley questions whether the pawn store has a thief in its midst when two teens come in with news of a scam.

programme.title: The UnXplained with William Shatner
programme.desc: Modern prophets and the concept of predicting the future, in terms of catastrophic premonitions or dreams of future crimes. Alternatively, he contemplates that the future may simply be an unknowable mystery, unfolding all the time.

programme.desc: Experts investigate an Italian mountain that has stood witness to inexplicable phenomena for centuries, wondering whether it could somehow be attracting alien visitors.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: People who make a living from bidding for the contents of abandoned storage units. programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Kenny is feeling nostalgic in Koreatown, so brings along an old friend - a notion that may or may not be a good idea. Brandi and Jarrod sweeten their profit in an unexpected way. Ivy tolerates the big city in an effort to find some name brand goodies.

programme.desc: Seth is excited when a clergyman sells him a rare baseball signed by Babe Ruth, complete with authentication papers - and knows it could be worth several thousand dollars.

programme.desc: Experts question the link between divine substances and extraterrestrials, wondering if the 'food of the gods' really has been sustaining Earth's alien visitors.

programme.desc: During the ninth century, millions of Maya abandoned their city centres located in the Guatemalan highlands, leading many to wonder why. Emerging technologies have shown that the population was much larger and more warlike than had been imagined. However, as Shatner reveals, many experts wonder whether the timing of their exodus suggests a more spiritual explanation.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.sub-title: The Jenny, the Baker, the Prosthetics Maker

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: Emily's husband, Cody, misses a bid and stirs up trouble. Brandi and Jarrod put their faith in the cowboy and end up facing their mortality. The Vegas Ladies struggle to be seen, while Ivy revisits some of his glory days.

programme.title: Dickinson's Real Deal

programme.title: UFOs Declassified
programme.desc: An investigation into the Roswell incident in 1947, when a UFO landed in the New Mexico desert. At the time, the US army claimed it had recovered a 'flying saucer', but this was quickly retracted and the item was declared to be a humble weather balloon. Experts examine the evidence still available to try to reach a conclusive answer as to whether the crashed object was from Earth or another planet.

programme.title: Alien Files: Unsealed

programme.title: My Life
programme.desc: Miyawata is a 15-year old indigenous activist from Winnipeg, Canada, who never hesitates to speak up for what she believes in. Each morning, schools in Canada play the national anthem, and all students are expected to stand. In protest of the injustices that her people have faced throughout the history of Canada, Miyawata sits down instead. But will she be able to persuade the head teacher to change the school’s land rights acknowledgement? Miyawata is also the organiser of school climate strikes in her hometown. The climate movement in Winnipeg had enormous momentum until Covid hit, and now that the end of the pandemic is in sight, she wants to get the movement going again..

It's trouble in paradise as Issa and Pedro are furious and decide to organise their own fiesta - meanwhile, PJ realises that Zoe's party isn't actually that cool..

programme.desc: Animation following the kindly but accident-prone Mr Magoo. Weasel, disguised as a supervillain atop a building under construction, has taken the President hostage. While Fizz prepares to act out a heroic rescue, Magoo appears in a ski suit and mistakes Weasel for a yeti..

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. A bird on the loose indoors sends everyone into hiding - Lloyd, who has been separated from Abacus and trapped in a pen lid with his neighbour Molly, is struggling with the notion of doing nothing and waiting it out, so he starts trying to think up an escape plan..

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies
programme.desc: An animated series about a young fly with a lot to prove. Lloyd and Abacus are on the hunt for a nice quiet spot to play their favourite board game - the trouble is that everywhere is either too loud, too busy, or too dangerous! They finally find the perfect place... but then they forget to take gravity into account..

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.sub-title: Council Of The Creek: Operation Hive-Mind
programme.desc: Hive Mind - When bees take over the Trading Tree, Craig must assemble the Council of the Creek to avert disaster..

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig of the Creek follows 10-year-old Craig Williams and his two friends, Kelsey and John Paul, as they go on adventures in a world of untamed, kid-dominated wilderness in the creek which acts as a utopia where children reign.

programme.title: LEGO Monkie Kid
programme.desc: Animated series following a young teenager on a mission to save the world. MK wakes up to a perfect life where he's defeated the entire Demon Bull King family - Pigsy tells him to take a break and everyone treats him like a hero, but MK soon realises that everything is not as it seems and that he's living in an illusion. MK is trapped in the nefarious Calabash, an ancient magical device wielded by Jin and Yin, the Gold and Silver Demons... can he break out of it?.

programme.title: LEGO Monkie Kid
programme.desc: Animated series following a young teenager on a mission to save the world. Everyone in the city is abuzz with talk of an upcoming street race that will grant the winner immortality - Mei and MK decide to enter the race, but a disagreement causes them to compete against each other. Their frustration boils over, causing them both to crash and the Demon Bull family to take the lead - when this happens, Mei and MK work together in order to create a new race car and win the race..

programme.title: Thunderbirds Are Go
programme.desc: The Tracy brothers and their friends at International Rescue set out to foil the nefarious plots of the evil Hood. An updated remake of the classic 1960s marionette adventure series, this time featuring computer-animated characters on live-action modeled sets. With the voices of Rosamund Pike, Kayvan Novak and Thomas Brodie-Sangster, with the original Parker - David Graham - returning to voice Lady Penelope's long-serving chauffeur.

programme.title: Overlord and the Underwoods
programme.desc: When movie night and game night are both cancelled, Overlord puts the Underwoods in a void-like escape room while he watches a movie in peace. Worst game night ever!.

programme.title: Drop Dead Weird
programme.desc: The Tubbershandy School dance is quickly approaching, and Lulu is struggling with whether or not she should ask Dermot to go with her. Comedy drama following the adventures of an Australian family who move to an isolated seaside village in western Ireland, with the parents having a secret to hide.

programme.title: Makeaway Takeaway
programme.desc: A comedy arts and crafts show for six to 11-year-olds and presented by comedian Bec Hill. Bec is expecting a very special visitor to the Takeaway - her Grandma! While making the place spick and span, she shows us a Takeaway technique that 'pandas' to our creative needs and helps a customer who needs a super-quick delivery for their Nana's birthday. Bec also comes up with a green-fingered make that doesn't need watering with just three ingredients, and an art teacher gets a colourful surprise!.

programme.title: Dare Master
programme.desc: Game show that sees teenage presenter Danny Murphy take on some of the craziest dares, from rock climbing to racing a hovercraft! In this episode, Danny experiences the thrill of a flying trapeze, but can he catch the bar and secure a win as the Dare Master?.

programme.title: Ted's Top Ten
programme.desc: Comedy series following the misadventures of Ted and his school friends and family. Jai is desperate to get a coveted position within the school library, only for his enemy Ethan to be on the panel and make a point of rejecting him. Taking matters into his own hands, Ted downloads the Friend Tree App, where he'll be able to become pals with Ethan and get Jai entry not only to the Librarians' Ball, but also Ethan's good books. Meanwhile, Lani and Stu fight over their good cop, bad cop roles..

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants and the Ghastly Danger of the Ghost Dentist
programme.desc: Animated comedy featuring two trouble-making young friends who re-imagine their grumpy headmaster as a superhero looking to fight crime and save their city. Around the campfire, George and Harold tell a ghost story about Gumbalina Toothington, a terrifying 18th-century dentist who roams the woods, but when Melvin makes a machine to create a real version of Gumbalina, he unleashes a real-life ghost dentist who threatens the camp with dental hygiene..

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Horror - Mo forgot to do his art studio homework! He fills the gap in a flash by taking one of his mother's anatomical models to school to pass it off as his own creation. It works, but Selina quickly realises that the foot is missing and warns Mo that he'll be in serious trouble - to make things worse, the model foot is stuffed with Mo's favourite video game, the one that Selina took from him and hid! Mo therefore has to break into Brick's office in order to get it back..

programme.title: 50/50 Heroes
programme.desc: Animated comedy series. Sam is due to take part in an eloquence contest whose prize was won by her mother and her grandmother when they were young - the pressure is on Sam, and that makes her unbelievably tense. Sam realises that she is lost for words when she feels stressed - to avoid catastrophe, she asks the Sceptre for the power of repartee. The half-power does provide her with snappy answers, but they are extremely caustic, and that's just the start of her problems....

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?

programme.desc: Jump into the Mystery Machine for more comedic mystery-solving adventures with Scooby and the gang. Actor Billy Dee Williams teaches the gang how to be cool at his 'Cool School', but when a pterodactyl suddenly appears, the gang and Billy have to put an end to the creature's mayhem..

programme.title: Smarty Pants
programme.desc: Animated comedy series about three kids and their missions from the Great Book of Cooldom. When a new novel by a famous crime author comes out, it's a huge deal, and our heroes are inspired to do a bit of detective work themselves. First they need to find a mystery to solve... who's hiding behind the Clookie-Clooka mask, the mascot for the local mall? If they manage to solve the mystery, they'll become popular and respected by all the detective story fans, but can they really spill the beans?.

programme.title: Lloyd of the Flies

programme.title: Building Britain's Canals
programme.desc: Writer and historian Dan Jones navigates Britain's longest canal to be built by just one company, the Leeds and Liverpool Canal. Built to link the economically booming counties of Yorkshire and Lancashire, this 19th-century superhighway was experimental for the time, and made Liverpool the busiest port in the world. In Burnley, the cotton capital of the 19th century, Dan visits the world's only steam-powered cotton mill, where enough cloth was woven each year to reach to the moon and back two-and-a-half times.
